subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Former pitcher Ugueth Urbina was sentenced to 14 years in prison for the attempted murder of five workers on his family’s ranch, the attorney general’s office in Caracas, Venezuela, said Wednesday.
snippet: Former pitcher Ugueth Urbina was sentenced to 14 years in prison for the attempted murder of five workers on his family’s ranch, the attorney general’s office in Caracas, Venezuela, said Wednesday.
